io.straas.android.sdk.messaging

Class ArchivedMessagesManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.straas.android.sdk.messaging.ArchivedMessagesManager

  • public class ArchivedMessagesManager
extends Object
    This provides user to achieve archived messages. See Message-Replay to read one of the use cases.

    To construct a ArchivedMessagesManager, you have to call initialize(Identity) to validate developer and get the result.

      • initialize

        public static com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<ArchivedMessagesManager> initialize(Identity identity)
        Validate developer and construct a ArchivedMessagesManager.

      • getArchivedMessagesMeta

        public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<ArchivedMessagesMeta> getArchivedMessagesMeta(String chatroomName,
                                                                                       String archiveId)
        Gets archived messages meta data. You could get the information in ArchivedMessagesMeta by chatroom name and archive id.
        Parameters:
        chatroomName - chatroom name
        archiveId - id of archived messages
        Returns:
        the ArchivedMessagesMeta or failure reason

      • getArchivedMessages

        public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<Message[]> getArchivedMessages(String chatroomName,
                                                                        String archiveId,
                                                                        long startTime,
                                                                        long endTime)
        Gets archived messages.

        The response time is increasing with the number of messages included in one single request. Normally, our best practice suggests |endTime - startTime| < 10000 (10 sec).

        Both of startTime and endTime couldn't be 0.
        Parameters:
        chatroomName - chatroom name
        archiveId - id of archived messages
        startTime - the start time of messages whose unit is the unix time in milliseconds
        endTime - the end time of messages whose unit is the unix time in milliseconds
        Returns:
        the Message[] or failure reason
